<Text: Double Dexter is the sixth novel written by Jeff Lindsay, and the sixth book in the 'Dexter Morgan' book series about a serial killer who targets serial killers.>

Text: Double Dexter: The Telegraph" said of the book, "Hilariously gruesome finale...All this ought to be gross nonsense but Jeff Lindsay’s cynical wit makes it fly".

Text: Double Dexter:  The "Orlando Sentinel" called it the best book of the series yet, saying the book "takes a tremendous leap forward as the author utilizes believable storytelling and large doses of dark humor" and "strongest outing as he richly delves into Dexter's very scarred psyche".
